name: Death Ray
description:
First of all, thank you guys for playing my game.

To make this game suitable for the theme Mirror, I design a game that has two mirrors that are used to control the direction of the laser source and use it to kill all the enemies.

If you let any enemy alive and that enemy touches the finished bar, the game will be over.

There are only 6 waves of enemies. You will be the winner if you can pass all these 6 waves.

Again, thank you so much for playing this game. I really appreciate it!

This is my very first game and it is also the first time I'm joining a game JAM. The JAM forces me to study a lot about game development. I will definitely join the next JAM.
